slides.title: Push vs Pull
slides.content:
# Push vs Pull ğŸ”„

## Pull (Traditional):
```
Client: Give me data! (every 5 sec)
Server: Here's the data
Client: Give me data! (every 5 sec)
Server: Here's the data
```

## Push (Real-Time):
```
Client: I'm listening...
Server: (when data changes) Here's new data!
Server: (when data changes) Here's new data!
```

## Comparison:
| Aspect | Pull | Push |
|--------|------|------|
| Latency | High | Low |
| Resources | Wasteful | Efficient |
| Complexity | Simple | Medium |
